pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 16  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)Poison & 2-4 on easy, 3-5 on normal, 4-8 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Swamps, $(l:world/structures#trial_chambers)Trial Chambers$() $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Bogged$() behave the same as normal $(l:creatures/undead-skeleton)$(thing)Skeletons$(), but attack at a slower rate and shoot $(item)Tipped Arrows$() that inflict $(l:brewing/effects#poison)$(thing)Poison$() for 4 seconds on any target that they hit. $(br)A $(thing)Bogged$() drops 2 $(item)Mushrooms$() when sheared.
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Bones, 0-2 Arrows, 50% chance Arrow of Poison, 8.5% chance for Equipment $(br)$(n)XP:$() 5-8
